00020 #ifndef _MLPACK_METHODS_AMF_SIMPLERESIDUETERMINATION_HPP_INCLUDED
00021 #define _MLPACK_METHODS_AMF_SIMPLERESIDUETERMINATION_HPP_INCLUDED
00022 
00023 #include <mlpack/core.hpp>
00024 
00025 namespace mlpack {
00026 namespace amf {
00027 
00028 class SimpleResidueTermination
00029 {
00030  public:
00031   SimpleResidueTermination(const double minResidue = 1e-10,
00032                            const size_t maxIterations = 10000)
00033         : minResidue(minResidue), maxIterations(maxIterations) { }
00034 
00035   template<typename MatType>
00036   void Initialize(const MatType& V)
00037   {
00038     residue = minResidue;
00039     iteration = 1;
00040     normOld = 0;
00041 
00042     const size_t n = V.n_rows;
00043     const size_t m = V.n_cols;
00044 
00045     nm = n * m;
00046   }
00047 
00048   bool IsConverged(arma::mat& W, arma::mat& H)
00049   {
00050     // Calculate norm of WH after each iteration.
00051     arma::mat WH;
00052 
00053     WH = W * H;
00054     double norm = sqrt(accu(WH % WH) / nm);
00055 
00056     if (iteration != 0)
00057     {
00058       residue = fabs(normOld - norm);
00059       residue /= normOld;
00060     }
00061 
00062     normOld = norm;
00063 
00064     iteration++;
00065     
00066     if(residue < minResidue || iteration > maxIterations) return true;
00067     else return false;
00068   }
00069 
00070   const double& Index() { return residue; }
00071   const size_t& Iteration() { return iteration; }
00072   const size_t& MaxIterations() { return maxIterations; }
00073 
00074 public:
00075   double minResidue;
00076   size_t maxIterations;
00077 
00078   double residue;
00079   size_t iteration;
00080   double normOld;
00081 
00082   size_t nm;
00083 }; // class SimpleResidueTermination
00084 
00085 }; // namespace amf
00086 }; // namespace mlpack
